sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SENESCHAL, ( Seneſchallus), derived from the German ſein “ a houſe or place,” and ſcale “ an officer,” is a ſteward, and ſignifies one who has the dispenſing of juſtice in some particular cases : As the high ſeneſchal or ſteward of England ; ſeneſchal de la hotel de roi, “ ſteward of the king’s houſehold, ſeneſchal, or ſteward of courts, &c.” Co. Lit. 61. Crοke's Jurisd. 102. Kiich. 83. See Steward.
